appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction img-head\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\" style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px;\"\u003e\r\n    \u003cimg src\u003d\"data:image/svg+xml;base64,\" alt\u003d\"App Icon\" style\u003d\"width: 30px; height: 30px;\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eLaw Enforcement Audio Analysis\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eOverview\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Analyzes officer-suspect conversations to detect sentiment, tone, emotion, and linguistic features.\r\n      Enables chatbot-based exploration of analyzed conversations for deeper insights.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eInput\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e You can upload your audio files (.mp3) that need analysis.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eOutput\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Speaker-specific transcription, sentiment, emotion, and linguistic analysis.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e AI chatbot responses based on the analyzed dialogue.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eBenefits\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n\u003cul\u003e\r\n  \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Enhances understanding of interactions by detecting risks, tone shifts, and speaker intent while supporting compliance.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html1",

      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,

appStages.name: Audio Transcript
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eAudio Transcription\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Upload your raw audio files to generate speaker-wise transcriptions.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e This tool supports diarization to distinguish between different speakers in the conversation.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html1",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Analysis Options",
              "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "inline": false,
              "tableView": false,
              "defaultValue": 1,
              "values": [
                {
                  "label": "Using existing raw audio file",
                  "value": "1",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Upload audio file",
                  "value": "2",
                  "shortcut": ""
                }
              ],
              "key": "selectOptions",
              "type": "radio",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Destination Path",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "redrawOn": "selectOption",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "customDefaultValue": "\n",
              "calculateValue": "\nif(data.selectOptions \u003d\u003d 1){\n  value \u003d \u0027/home/sparkflows/fire-3.3.2-rc18_spark_3.5.2/data/GENAI/Law-Enforcement-Audio-Analysis/Raw-Audio/Behavioral-Analysis-Gustavo-X.mp3\u0027;\n}else{\n  value \u003d \u0027data/GENAI/Law-Enforcement-Audio-Analysis/Upload-Dir\u0027;\n}",
              "calculateServer": true,
              "validate": {
                "required": true
              },
              "key": "destinationPath",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true,
              "keyModified": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "keyModified": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Speakers Count",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "2",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "speakers_count",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Upload Raw Audio File",
              "description": "Upload audio (.mp3) file here",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": false,
              "storage": "base64",
              "webcam": false,
              "fileTypes": [
                {
                  "label": "",
                  "value": ""
                }
              ],
              "validate": {
                "required": true
              },
              "key": "file",
              "conditional": {
                "show": true,
                "when": "selectOptions",
                "eq": "2"
              },
              "type": "file",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns4",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Context",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "\"the officer is conducting a behavioral analysis\"",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "context",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Upload",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right btn-outline rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "upload",
              "conditional": {
                "show": true,
                "when": "selectOptions",
                "eq": "2"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "upload",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns5",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Get transcript",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded mt- btn-outline",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "submit1",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "execute",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns6",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-bottom:1px solid #E0E0E0;margin-left:-16px;margin-right:-16px;\"\u003e\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Go Back",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "secondary",
              "customClass": "btn-outline  mt-0 float-left rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "back",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "back",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Next",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "getStarted",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "next",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns2",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    }
  ]
}

appStages.name: Conversation Analysis
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eConversation Analysis \u0026 Chat Bot\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html1",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Perform detailed analysis of transcribed conversations to extract emotional and linguistic insights.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Use the chatbot to ask questions and receive context-aware responses based on the conversation.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e",
